# apply_keys {#sec-doc}
    

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple" title="docblock" collapse=false}    


```{julia}
#| eval: false
apply_keys(d::Dict, f)

```

Apply the function `f` to each key of `d` and return  a dictionary with the same values of `d`. 
 
## Arguments
  * `d`: a dictionary.
  * `f`: a function.


:::
